Class SeqMaxHeap<T extends Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
SeqMaxHeap<T>
public class SeqMaxHeap<T extends Comparable<T>> extends Object
MaxHeap made using sequential insertion. It takes input from .txt files and outputs the initial 10 objects in an array. Afterward, it provides the number of swaps in the heaps creation.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sean Sang

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      This program reads integers from two text files, builds a max heap for each file, and then analyzes the heap. 480 swaps for data_sorted verified through Python
